Erewhon Members who are new to the Paceline app are gifted a welcome bonus of

3600
Pacepoints

to redeem on various health & wellness rewards… That's the equivalent of rewards for over 3 weeks of heavy exercise.

Download the app

Rewarding healthy progress at your pace

Paceline is your motivator to live a healthy life, rewarding you for making progress toward your health goals. Elevate your heart rate for more than 50 minutes each week and reap the financial benefits.

How it works

Step 1

Track Your Activity

Our app connects with Apple Watch, Garmin, and Fitbit. Just download, connect, and start moving.

Step 2

Hit Your Streak

150 minutes of elevated heart rate a week = Streak. That’s less than 30 minutes a day!

Step 3

Unlock Rewards

We partner with brands to reward you with exclusive offers and sweet deals.

Activate Your Benefits

Submit the information associated with your Erewhon account and we'll send you your member-exclusive codes within 7 business days
